title: Update regarding BLK
story_body:
Bloomberg News
2023-01-18 07:01:00 AM EST

BlackRock, Inc. (BLK) Reports Q4 Results

BlackRock, Inc. (BLK) released its fourth-quarter financial results for the period ended December 31, 2022. 

Revenue for the quarter totaled $6.4 billion, a 13% increase from the same period in 2021. This growth reflects strong demand for the company's investment products and services.

Total net inflows for the quarter were $146 billion, driven by $93 billion in long-term net inflows and $53 billion in cash management net inflows. 

The company's total assets under management as of December 31, 2022, were $8.59 trillion, a 5% increase from the prior quarter.

BlackRock, Inc. (BLK) notes that the revenue growth reflects the company's continued ability to attract new clients and expand its relationships with existing ones.

BlackRock, Inc. (BLK) will host a conference call today at 8:30 a.m. EST to discuss its quarterly results in more detail.
